Package com.soprabanking.ips.services

Class ProposalService

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.services.ProposalService
@Service
public class ProposalService
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing Proposal Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Proposal objects from the database ,received from the ProposalController and FeedController

Proposal Service provides a range of service methods each of which is responsible for processing various request for performing the following operations:

  1. Fetching list of all the proposals shared with a given Team for displaying them in the default Team feed.
  2. Creating a new Proposal by a User.
  3. Updating an existing Proposal.
  4. Sharing a given proposal,or
  5. Deleting an existing Proposal

Service methods invokes the respective methods of CommentDAO,UpvotesDAO,TeamDAO,UserDAO and ProposalDAO in order to return the required results to the ProposalController and FeedController

Author:
araghav
See Also:
Proposal, CommentDAO, UserDAO, ProposalDAO, TeamDAO, UpvotesDAO, ProposalController, FeedController

  • Constructor Details

    • ProposalService

      public ProposalService()

  • Method Details

    • getDefault

      public java.util.List<Proposal> getDefault​(java.lang.String body)
      Returns a List of all the Proposal objects shared with a given Team in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result.
      2. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
      3. A size value for specifying the number of proposals required on a given page(specified by Page value).
      4. id of Team specifying the team ,proposals shared with whose members have to be fetched.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, Start Date and End Dates specifying the time period of creation of every Proposal in the resulting list,Page value specifying the page number of the list of Proposal objects to be fetched,a Size value specifying the number of Proposal objects required on the given page and id value of Team specifying the team,proposals shared with the members of whom have to be fetched) and then retrieves the subset of list of proposals created in the specified time duration ,created/sliced according to the specified Page and Size Values with the help of ProposalDAO.getDefault(Team, Date, Date, Pageable) method of ProposalDAO.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for fetching the List of all the Proposals stored in database
      Returns:
      List of all the Proposal objects shared with a given Team
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.getDefault(Team, Date, Date, Pageable)

    • deleteProposal

      public boolean deleteProposal​(java.lang.String body)
      Deletes an existing Proposal object in response to the specified Request Body String containing the id value of the Proposal object to be deleted.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the Proposal which has to be deleted.) and then does the following :

      1. Deletes all the Comment objects for the given Proposal with the help of CommentDAO.fetchAllComments(Long) and CommentDAO.deleteComment(Long) methods of CommentDAO,
      2. Deletes all the Upvotes for the given Proposal with the help of UpvotesDAO.fetchAllUpvotes(Long) and UpvotesDAO.deleteUpvote(com.soprabanking.ips.models.Upvotes) of UpvotesDAO
      3. Deletes the Proposal with a given id value with the help of ProposalDAO.deleteProposal(Long) method of ProposalDAO.
      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for deleting an existing Proposal.
      Returns:
      A boolean true if the proposal is deleted successfully and false if delete could not be performed
      See Also:
      CommentDAO.fetchAllComments(Long), CommentDAO.deleteComment(Long), UpvotesDAO.fetchAllUpvotes(Long), UpvotesDAO.deleteUpvote(com.soprabanking.ips.models.Upvotes)

    • saveProposal

      public Proposal saveProposal​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates and returns a new Proposal object that is made by a particular User according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal which is being created,
      2. id of the User who is creating the given Proposal and,
      3. Title of the Proposal
      4. Textual description of the Proposal.
      5. List of teams to which the Proposal has to be forwarded.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the new Proposal which is being created,id of the User who is making the proposal,title of the proposal ,text of the proposal and the list of teams to which the new proposal has to be forwarded.) ,creates a new Proposal object containing a title and textual description forwarded to a number of teams made by the given User on current date and time ,save the newly created Proposal into the database with the help of ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal) method of ProposalDAO and retrieves the saved Proposal object from the database.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for creating a new Proposal
      Returns:
      A newly created Proposal object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal)

    • updateProposal

      public Proposal updateProposal​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Updates and returns an existing Proposal object according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal which is being updated,
      2. New/Updated Title of the Proposal
      3. New/Updated Textual description of the Proposal.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the existing Proposal which is being updated,new title of the proposal , new description of the proposal.) ,saves the Proposal object containing the updated title and textual description into the database with the help of ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal) method of ProposalDAO and retrieves the saved Proposal object from the database.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for updating an existing Proposal
      Returns:
      Updated Proposal object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal)

    • shareProposal

      public Proposal shareProposal​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Shares and returns an existing Proposal object according to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. id value of the Proposal which is being shared,
      2. List of teams with which the Proposal is being shared.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, id value of the existing Proposal which is being shared and the list of teams with which the proposal is being shared.) ,saves the Proposal object with the teams to which it is shared ,to the database with the help of ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal) method of ProposalDAO and retrieves the saved Proposal object from the database.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for sharing a given Proposal
      Returns:
      Shared Proposal object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.saveProposal(Proposal)
